about_the_game:
Before you play, this is a Retro game Keyboard only! there are only 3 keys Left/Right and Fire. In the good old days of the 80s we played the games we were given quirks and all. they had quirks but were addictive. I hope you like Retro,

The game is Themed on the Wild West. Its an arcade game, where the Lawmen try to get past and make arrests, you get to shoot your six shooters at them, but it may make them angry or destroy them, the angry Lawmen are worth many more points. you get three Lives. a stage coach blocks shots from both sides so can be used as a shield.

The Score board shows past games, and a high score is displayed while playing to compete against, its truly addictive to try and beat the high score. The game has other themes like frogs crossing a road, and invading aliens, as well as Mars. so get ready for a keyboard only shoot'em up

A WW2 card game is included!

short_description: Arcade, Arcade! Arcade!! back to the Eighties and the wild west. Stop the Lawmen getting past by shooting them, if they get past they will make arrests. you get three lives to get the highest score you can. and a ww2 card game
